channel.title: Merc shields prince, prince still dies (while merc is jailed)
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was merc and had shield on prince. I was jailed. Prince died the night he jailed me.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I thought merc shield stays on a target until I change target. Therefore, prince should have survived the attack.
Or perhaps being jailed cancels it and it's working as intended.
#### Steps to reproduce: Merc shields prince. On the next night, prince jails the merc. Someone attacks prince. Prince dies.
#### Comments: Full disclosure: I might be wrong concerning how merc shield works. I thought shield protected the target regardless of my current nightly actions.
